title: Project - Andrew Schmelyun
description: All of the current and previously-developed open and closed-source apps, websites, and packages from Andrew Schmelyun.

projects.title: Use The Keyboard
projects.description: is a simplistic and open-sourced repository of keyboard shortcuts for a variety of websites and apps.

projects.title: Larametrics
projects.description: is a self-hosted metrics and notifications platform for Laravel apps, built with production environments in mind.

projects.title: PDFBlade
projects.description: is a developer-friendly HTML to PDF API with robust documentation and a wide variety of formatting options.

projects.title: Cleaver
projects.description: is what this site was built with. It's a blazing-fast static site generator that uses Laravel's Blade templating engine.

projects.title: Budget.cool
projects.description: is a simplistic and free budgeting app with a manual-only entry mode. Built as a Vue SPA with a Laravel backend.

projects.title: Larahawk
projects.description: is an easy-to-setup, super simple error reporting and notifications platform for Laravel applications.

projects.title: Passhints
projects.description: is a simplistic and open-sourced repository of password requirements for a variety of websites and apps.

projects.title: Watch The Credits
projects.description: is an online library of movies, detailing whether or not they contain mid or after-credit scenes and spoilers.

projects.title: docker-compose-laravel
projects.description: is a very basic Docker workflow for local Laravel app development, originally built for a video series on the same subject.
